column1: AOPP employs about 25 post-doctoral researchers. Information about
current opportunities within the sub-department is available <a
addition, several funds exists to promote research programmes
developed by the applicant.  This type of application requires the
support of AOPP, as the Host Institution.  AOPP welcomes and
encourages researchers wishing to explore this type of opportunity to
contact an appropriate member of the sub-department (in his or her
research area) or the HoD well before the closing date of the research
call. Funding is available through the following schemes:
• Royal Commission for the Exhibition of 1851 Research Fellowships 25 February 2005
• Violette and Samuel Glasstone Research Fellowships in Science 6 December 2004
which sponsor scientific collaboration between centres of excellence
